dmca.title: Carl Sagan Estate Tells Google to Take Down "Cosmos" Episodes
dmca.body:
[PRIVATE]
Attorney at Law
[PRIVATE]
Ithaca, New York 14850
Phone: [PRIVATE]
Fax: [PRIVATE]
Email: [PRIVATE]
Web address: www.smattorneyatlaw.com


October 27, 2006 

Via Facsimile & First Class Mail

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support DMCA Complaints
[PRIVATE]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Cosmos by Carl Sagan

To whom it may concern:

We are writing on behalf of our client, Druyan-Sagan Associates, Inc., formerly 
known, as Carl Sagan Productions, Inc., the lawful owner in the rights to Cosmos by 
Carl Sagan. This letter is submitted in compliance with the Digital Millennium 
Copyrigtft Act of 1998 (DMCA) (17 U.S.C.
